column4:
['Hoy locha lapaacha nahi maangata', '
Locha lapaacha nahi maangata,', '
Apun ko sachcha pyaar maangata', '
Jhakkaas chikkaas yaar maangatay,', '
Yaar maangata dildaar maangata', '
Yeh chikane kya maangata', '
Tu mungadha, main gudh ki dali,', '
Meri jawaani hai mokad kali', '
Halu halu bol pascal hai jaagata,', '
Agg bai\xa0 nahi maangata', '
Hey bhidu kya bolata,', '
Mala maahit nari re', 'Raapchik raapchik did shahaana,', '
Under world ka hai aathaana', '
Encounter mein toda gilaas,', '
Apani mandali, apani vadreli', '
Apani mandali hai bindhaas,', '
Ghevun taak', '
Guru kya maangata halwa', '
Mungadha, main gudh ki dali,', '
Meri jawaani hai mokad kali', '
Halu halu bol pascal hai jaagata,', '
Yeh bhaai ke maange', '
Mala maahit nari re', 'Pascal adde ki nautak de,', '
Chal kaali kombadi jara hawa aane de', '
Pascal adde ki nautak de,', '
Chal kaali kombadi jara hawa aane de', '
Aangadu baangadu ke bhaai hai hum', '
Aangadu baangadu ke bhaai hai hum', '
Pauli ke rupaya bhi paayi ho tum', '
Chal hawa aane de, hawa aane de', '
Maane pura baar na jaane,', '
You mean akhkha india', '
Bindaas pi are bindaas ji,', '
Yeh bhankas na kar tu meri gali', '
Guruo ka guru tu hai mahaaguru,', '
Raajaao ke raaja chal ho ja shuru', '
Yeh bhidu kya bolata, mala maahit nari re', '
Locha lapaacha nahi maangata,', '
Apun ko sachcha pyaar maangata', '
Locha lapaacha nahi maangata,', '
Apun ko sachcha pyaar maangata', '
Jhakkaas chikkaas yaar maangatay,', '
Yaar maangata dildaar maangata.']
